dcterms:description: A dataset containing T cell receptor (TCR) sequences and their corresponding peptide-MHC (pMHC) interactions, which is used for benchmarking TCR specificity prediction models.
dcterms:title: VDJdb

dcterms:creator: 10x Genomics
dcterms:description: A whitepaper detailing a new method for exploring immunity by linking highly multiplexed antigen recognition to immune repertoire and phenotype.
dcterms:title: 10x Genomics whitepaper

dcterms:description: A dataset containing paired αβ T cell receptor sequences sampled from healthy human subjects, used for training and evaluating TCR representation models.
dcterms:title: Tanno et al. dataset
